MsgJp:
戦場の咆哮が聞こえるか？　
扉の先は、おそらく敵味方入り交じる混戦状態――
MsgEn:
Hear the roar of the battleground?
'Tis a mix of both friend and foe clashing forces.

MsgJp:
さあ、やっちゃって！
今日のあんたには白竜の加護があるんだから！
MsgEn:
Alright, charge!
The White Dragon will protect you!

MsgJp: さあ！　全てのオークどもを切り倒せ！
MsgEn:
Okay! Cut down every one of
these foul Orcs!

MsgJp:
ぷんぷん臭ってくるね
ああ、腹立つ！　許さないから！
MsgEn:
What an intense odor.
Oh, I'm mad now! No mercy!

MsgJp: 次から次へと来るぞ！　体力に気をつけろ
MsgEn:
'Tis one after the other! Heed
your stamina!

MsgJp: ひとりで全部倒してしまえ！　遠慮は無用だ！
MsgEn:
Fell them all with reckless
abandon!

MsgJp: いいぞ！　その調子だ！
MsgEn: Good! Keep it up!

MsgJp: ほら、来てるよ！　やっちゃえ！
MsgEn: There, more of them! Charge!

MsgJp: もう、鼻が曲がる～！　さっさと終わらせよう！
MsgEn:
Ah, my poor nose...! Let's finish
this quickly!

MsgJp: いいねえ！　あとはまかせちゃおうかな
MsgEn: Nice! I owe you one!

MsgJp: いい調子だぞ！
MsgEn: We're doing good!

MsgJp: 敵は残り少ないぞ！　押せ！
MsgEn: Their numbers dwindle! Finish it!

MsgJp: 追い風に乗れ！
MsgEn: Make use of our advantage!

MsgJp: くそっ！　敵、増兵だ！
MsgEn: Blast! Enemy reinforcements!

MsgJp: 増援だ！　気を引きしめろ！
MsgEn: Reinforcements! Steel yourself!

MsgJp: まだいたのか！
MsgEn: There are more still!

MsgJp: もう少しだよ！
MsgEn: Just a bit more!

MsgJp: いい感じ！　このまま！
MsgEn: Good! Like that!

MsgJp: 優勢優勢！
MsgEn: Strength! Power!

MsgJp: まだいたか！　くう～！
MsgEn: More of them!? Grrr!

MsgJp: 残念、敵が増えちゃった！
MsgEn: I'm afraid they've grown in number!

MsgJp: あーあ、敵、増援だ！
MsgEn: Oh no... Enemy reinforcements!

MsgJp: 頼りにしてるぞ、新人！
MsgEn: You're up, newcomer!

MsgJp: ここまで攻め込まれるとは――不覚！
MsgEn: They were foolish to invade this far!

MsgJp:
オークはまだまだいる！
一匹残らず倒すぞ！
MsgEn:
Orcs still remain!
Fell them to the very last!

MsgJp:
さすが、レオ隊長が見込んだ新人だな！
このまま砦を掃除するぞ！
MsgEn:
Leo was right to about you, as ever!
We'll clean the fort in no time!

MsgJp: 敵には<COL ff7575><KCT ATTACK1>／<KCT ATTACK2></COL>で基本攻撃！
MsgEn:
Use <COL ff7575><KCT ATTACK1>/
<KCT ATTACK2></COL> to attack enemies!

MsgJp: さらに<COL ff7575><PADM><KCT WEAPON_SUB>を押しながら</PADM><KEYM><KCT SKILL_CUSTOM3></COL>か</KEYM>
<COL ff7575><PADM><KCT ATTACK1></PADM><KEYM><KCT SKILL_CUSTOM1></KEYM></COL>でカスタムスキルだ！
MsgEn:
Use <COL ff7575><PADM><KCT
ATTACK1></PADM><KEYM><KCT
SKILL_CUSTOM1></KEYM></COL>
to perform custom skills!

MsgJp: <COL ff7575><PADM><KCT WEAPON_MAIN>を押しながら</PADM><KEYM><KCT SKILL_CUSTOM4></KEYM></COL>でもOKだ！
技は画面右下のガイドで確認してくれ！
MsgEn:
Your skills are shown at the bottom
right of your screen!

MsgJp: オークや大型の敵には近づき、<COL ff7575><KCT TOUCH></COL>でしがみついて攻撃だ！
MsgEn:
To grab your enemies, press <COL ff7575><KCT
TOUCH></COL>,
which can even be used to climb Orcs and
other larger foes!

MsgJp: 走る時は<COL ff7575><PADM>移動方向に<KEYN L_STICK>を倒しながら押し込み<KEYM>初期設定の場合、同じ移動キー２回押し</KEYM></COL>でダッシュだ！
MsgEn:
While running, <COL ff7575><PADM>press down on
the<KEYN L_STICK>while pushing in a
direction<KEYM>with the default setting,
tap the same directional key twice</KEYM></COL>
to sprint!

MsgJp:
【ヒント：新たなメインクエストについて】
新たな<COL ff7575>メインクエスト＜和解の使者＞</COL>が受注可能になりました
謁見の間にいるレオに話しかけて受注しましょう
MsgEn:
[Tip: About New Main Quests]
New <COL ff7575>Main Quest (Envoy of Reconciliation)</COL>
Gain new orders by speaking to Leo, who is in
the Audience Chamber.

MsgJp:
まず《謁見の間》へ行くこと
そのあとでまた会おう
少し話そうぜ
MsgEn:
First go to the "Audience Chamber". We'll talk again
when we meet later on.

MsgJp:
画面右上のミニマップを見て、赤いマーカーが示す
《謁見の間》へ向かいましょう
MsgEn:
Look at the minimap on the top-right of
the screen, and head for the "Audience Chamber"
indicated by the red marker.

MsgJp: マップを拡大すると見やすくなります
MsgEn:
Expanding the map out makes it easier
to see everything.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：ミニマップのサイズ変更】
MsgEn: [Tip: Resizing the Minimap]

MsgJp: <COL ff7575><KCT UI_MINIMAP>を押しながら<KCT UI_MINIMAP_SCALING></COL>でサイズ変更
MsgEn:
<COL ff7575>While holding <KCT UI_MINIMAP>, change minmap
size by pressing <KCT UI_MINIMAP_SCALING></COL>

MsgJp: ついてきな――謁見の間の前まで案内してやるよ
MsgEn:
Follow me. I'll show you around
the Audience Chamber.

MsgJp: この神殿は白竜の守護のもと――神官によって統治されてるんだ
MsgEn:
This temple is under the
protection of the White Dragon, and governed
by the priests.

MsgJp: 砦戦はどうだった？レオとイリスに相当いわれたようだな
MsgEn:
How went the battle? It seems
it went fairly well according to Leo and Iris.

MsgJp: 一人前の覚者になるためには――まだまだ戦い方を知る必要があるぜ
MsgEn:
In order to become an Arisen,
you still need to know how to properly fight.

MsgJp: 今のジョブが自分に合ってないと思うなら<COL ff7575>いつでも他のジョブに転職</COL>も可能だ
MsgEn:
If you feel your current
vocation does not suit you, <COL ff7575>it is possible to change
to another vocation at any time.</COL>

MsgJp: <COL ff7575>装備を強くしたりスキルの使い方</COL>などいろいろ教える事があるが――まずは白竜に挨拶が先だ
MsgEn:
There are many things to be
taught, such as <COL ff7575>enhancing equipment and
properly utilizing skills.</COL>
Before that however, it is time to greet the
former White Dragon.

MsgJp: <COL ff7575>他の覚者と一緒に冒険に出る</COL>――これもお前がもう少し一人前になってからだ
MsgEn:
<COL ff7575>Go out and adventure with
other Arisen</COL>, even if you feel you can handle
things on your own.

MsgJp: あと自分の容姿が気に入らないようなら<COL ff7575>＜商店区＞にある美容院</COL>にいくといいぜ
MsgEn:
If you're unsatisfied with your
appearance, seek out the hairdresser
<COL ff7575>located in the Shopping District's beauty salon.</COL>

MsgJp: ついたぞ――この先が謁見の間だ
MsgEn:
We've arrived. Beyond this
point lies the Audience Chamber.

MsgJp:
今さら自己紹介でもないが
俺は覚者の統率――まとめ役のレオだ
MsgEn:
Albeit a bit late for an introduction,
I am Leo, leader of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
俺が重要だと考えている
覚者の務めは、ふたつ
MsgEn:
I would like to think myself important,
as are the duties of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
ひとつは――
石化した白竜の回復を助け
完全なる復活への後押しをすること
MsgEn:
First of which, is to reverse the petrification of
the White Dragon, and strive towards its complete
revival.

MsgJp:
心臓を捧げた俺たちと
その心臓を預かる白竜は一心同体だ
MsgEn:
We who dedicated our hearts, and the
White Dragon whom safeguards the heart,
are all of one mind.

MsgJp:
白竜が力を取り戻せば、俺たち覚者の
力も増す――もちろん、その逆もしかり
MsgEn:
If the White Dragon regains their strength, so
too shall our strength increase, and of
course, the reverse is also true.

MsgJp:
加えて――
白竜はこのレスタニアの大地とも
深くつながっている
MsgEn:
Additionally, the White Dragon is also deeply
connected to this land of Lestania.

MsgJp:
つまり、レスタニアと、人々の未来は
我々の双肩にかかっているというわけだ
MsgEn:
In other words, Lestania and the people's
future, rests upon our shoulders.

MsgJp:
もうひとつの務めは
白竜の砦となり、盾として戦うこと
MsgEn:
Another duty of ours is to become a bulwark of
the White Dragon, to fight as their shield.

MsgJp:
このところ、オークどもの勢いが増している
防衛隊はあちこちの小競り合いで敗走を重ね
グリッテン砦への侵入まで許してしまった
MsgEn:
Recently, the Orc's offensive momentum has
increased, and the Defense Corps have been
repeatedly driven to defeat in skirmishes against
them. We've allowed this to continue, that is,
until the invasion of Gritten Fort.

MsgJp:
このきびしい季節の到来に合わせるように
覚者になった意味を考えてくれ
そうすれば、生き方が見えてくるだろう
MsgEn:
As this harsh season arrives,
consider the meaning of becoming an Arisen.
Then, you'll see a way to live.

MsgJp:
もちろん、苦難に背を向ける生き方もある
だが、おまえは誇り高き道を選ぶ――
MsgEn:
Of course, there are ways to live that keep one
away from suffering, but you chose a way to
live proudly...

MsgJp: ああ、俺の目にくるいはない
MsgEn: Ah... there's nothing in my eye.

MsgJp: （白竜は半ば石になっている――）
MsgEn: (The White Dragon is partially turned to stone--)

MsgJp:
グリッテン砦からのお帰りですね？
初陣、お疲れさまでした
MsgEn:
I see you are back from Fort Gritten?
Good job on your first mission!

MsgJp: ここであらためてお話ししたいことがあります
MsgEn:
There is something I would like to 
talk about again here.

MsgJp:
白竜様がここにいらっしゃる経緯と
現在の状況は知っていますね？
MsgEn:
Do you know the background and current situation 
of Lord White Dragon being here?

MsgJp:
白竜様は３００年前に竜力の大部分を使い果たし
残されていたのは
あなたたち覚者を生み出す力だけでした
MsgEn:
Lord White Dragon exhausted the majority of his 
Dragon Force 300 years ago. 

What remained was only 
the power to create you Arisen.

MsgJp:
白竜様は最後の力を振り絞って
幾人もの――異例なことですが――幾人もの
覚者を誕生させたのです
MsgEn:
Lord White Dragon exerted his last 
remaining strength, and remarkably, 
he gave birth to numerous Arisen,
despite it being an unusual occurrence.

MsgJp:
全身の石化が始まったのはその後のことで
今では時折目覚めては覚者を生み出すくらい――
MsgEn:
The petrification of the whole body began 
afterwards, and now he only occasionally 
wakes up and produces an Arisen--

MsgJp:
竜力の減退で野山の活力までもが弱まり
それに乗じてオークや魔物が力をつけています
MsgEn:
With the decline of Dragon Force, 
even the vigor of the 
fields and mountains has weakened. 
Taking advantage of this, 
the Orcs and enemies have grown stronger.

MsgJp:
白竜様に心臓を預けたあなたたちは
時の流れから解放され、老いることはありません
MsgEn:
Those of you who have entrusted your hearts 
to Lord White Dragon are liberated from the flow 
of time and do not age.

MsgJp:
でも、忘れないでください
レスタニアの大地、そこに暮らす人々――
その上を、時は変わらず流れているのです
MsgEn:
But don't forget the land of Lestania, 
or the people who live there--
over which time flows unchanged!

MsgJp:
白竜様の復活がどうか間に合いますように
わたしはそう願わずにはいられません
あなたの力を、ぜひ、貸してください
MsgEn:
I hope that the resurrection of 
Lord White Dragon will be in time.
I cannot help but wish for it.
Please, lend me your power.

MsgJp: わたしは神官のジョゼフだ
MsgEn: I am Joseph, a priest.

MsgJp:
神官と言ってもぴんと来ないだろうが
この神殿を中心とする政（まつりごと）の
取りまとめが主な仕事だ
MsgEn:
Even if I say "priest", 
you probably won't understand, 
but the main job is to manage the ceremonies 
centered around this temple.

MsgJp:
オークどもとの戦争に加えて
味方同士である覚者と騎士団の反目もあってな――
MsgEn:
In addition to the war with the orcs,
there is also tension between the Arisen and 
the Knight's Order, who are allies...

MsgJp:
部隊編成やら任務の分担、あらゆる事に
口を出すことにしている
MsgEn:
I make it a point to involve myself
in everything, from forming squads
to assigning missions.

MsgJp: ところで、この神殿の歴史は知っているか？
MsgEn:
By the way, 
do you know the history of this temple?

MsgJp:
ふむ――簡単に説明しておこう
かれこれ、３００年前のことだ――
MsgEn:
Hmm―― let me explain it briefly. 
This happened about 300 years ago――

MsgJp:
この地に墜落し、身動きもならない白竜――
その身を案じたレスタニアの民が力を合わせ
長い時間をかけて造りあげたのがこの神殿だ
MsgEn:
The people of Lestania, 
concerned about the white dragon that crashed here
and was unable to move, joined forces
and built this temple over a long period of time.

MsgJp:
堅牢な神殿、覚者、騎士団――
そして戦えない者たちが捧げる祈り――
すべてが白竜を守る力となるのだ
MsgEn:
A solid temple, the Arisen, the Knight Order――
And the prayers offered by those who cannot fight―
All become the power to protect the White Dragon.

MsgJp:
どれひとつとして、欠けてはいけない
――いいな？
すべてを尊重し、慈しむのだ
MsgEn:
None of them should be missing.
-- alright?
Respect and care for all of them.

MsgJp:
僕はクラウス
ジョゼフ様の助手さ
まあ、使いっ走りみたいなものだね
MsgEn:
I am Klaus,
the assistant of Master Joseph.
Well, I suppose I'm more like a errand boy.

MsgJp:
え？　
いやいや、僕は覚者じゃないんだ
MsgEn: Huh? No, no, I'm not an Arisen.

MsgJp:
覚者たちのほとんどは神殿の外――
レスタニアのあちこちを駆け巡っているよ
MsgEn:
Most of the Arisen are outside the temple - 
running around Lestania.

MsgJp:
もちろん、レオが一声かければ
大勢の覚者が集まるわけだけど
MsgEn:
Of course, if Leo were to call out,
many Arisen would gather together.

MsgJp:
ところで君は《ブラッドオーブ》を知ってるかい？
白竜様に捧げると石化の進行を
食い止めることができるんだ
MsgEn:
By the way, do you know about the "Blood Orb"? 
If you offer it to Lord White Dragon, 
you can halt the progression of petrification.

MsgJp:
でも、なかなか手に入らなくてさ
《ブラッドオーブ》のことは
いつでも頭の片隅で気にしておくといい
MsgEn:
But, it's quite hard to get, you know.
It's good to always keep the thought 
of the 《Blood Orb》
in the back of your mind.

MsgJp:
わたしは白衛騎士団――通称白騎団の
団長を拝命しているゲルトだ
MsgEn:
I am Gerd, 
the Commander of the White Guard Knights, 
also known as the White Knights.

MsgJp: 見たところ、貴殿は覚者になって日も浅いようだ
MsgEn:
From what I can see, 
t seems that you have recently become an Arisen.

MsgJp:
これから見聞を広げるのだろうが、
先輩たち――特に覚者から、くだらない偏見を
吹き込まれないようにな
MsgEn:
You're about to broaden your horizons,
but make sure not to let the seniors,
especially among the Arisen, instill
foolish prejudices in you.

MsgJp:
残念なことに覚者の中には
我々騎士団を下に見る者もいる
例えば、こんな陰口をきいたことはないか？
MsgEn:
Unfortunately, among the Arisen, there are 
those who look down upon our knight order. 
Have you ever heard such slander such as this?

MsgJp:
ミミズのフンほどのわずかな報酬のために
騎士になった者がいる――
MsgEn:
There are those who become knights 
for the sake of a reward as meager as worm dung.

MsgJp: 違うぞ！　断じて違う！
MsgEn: That's not true! Absolutely not true!

MsgJp:
我々は全て、白竜様のために
レスタニアのために！
そこに生きる人々のために剣と命を捧げたのだ
MsgEn:
For the sake of the White Dragon,
and for the sake of Lestania!
We have devoted our swords and lives
for the people who live there.

MsgJp: 貴殿たち覚者のように、運命でも使命でもなく――
MsgEn: Like you, noble Arisen, not bound by fate or purpose--

MsgJp:
戦いに背を向けることもできたのに
それをいさぎよしとせず、騎士になる道を選んだ
意志と奉仕の塊が、我々白衛騎士団なのだ
MsgEn:
Even though we could have turned 
our backs on the fight,
we chose the path to become knights.
The embodiment of will and service, 
we are the White Guard Knights.

MsgJp:
もし、貴殿の態度にナめた様子があれば
容赦なく思い知らせてやるからな
MsgEn:
If I see any nonsense in your attitude,
I will show you no mercy.

MsgJp:
ええと――
自己紹介はしたんだっけ？　まだだっけ？
ま、いいか――わたしはイリス
MsgEn:
Um... Did I introduce myself? Or not yet?
Well, it's okay... I'm Iris.

MsgJp:
たいていはレオとつるんでいて
あちこち走り回っているの
MsgEn:
I usually hang out with Leo and 
run around here and there.

MsgJp:
覚者の連絡係みたいなものだね
結構大変な仕事だから頼りになりそうなら
仕事、譲ってもいいよ
MsgEn:
It's like I'm the Arisen's liaison.
It's quite a demanding job,
so if you seem reliable,
I might pass it on to you.

MsgJp:
覚者ってさ、みんな基本的に、バラバラに
生きているんだよね
MsgEn:
The Arisen, you know, everyone basically lives
their own lives, scattered all over the place.

MsgJp:
心臓が時を刻まないから、時間が幾らでも
あるでしょ？
だからさ、いろんなこと考えちゃうんだ
MsgEn:
Since your heart doesn't beat time, 
you have all the time in the world, right?
That's why you think about all sorts of things.

MsgJp: 覚者とは？人生とは？自分って何？とかさ
MsgEn:
What is an Arisen? 
What is life? 
What is self? 
I wonder.

MsgJp:
もちろん、白竜を守るのが本業だけど
その守り方も、ただ戦うだけじゃなくて
覚者ならではの方法を探すべき――とか
いろいろな考え方があるわけよ
MsgEn:
Of course, 
protecting the White Dragon is our main duty,
but our approach to protecting it isn't just about 
fighting.

As Arisen, 
we should seek out methods unique to us――
there are various ways of thinking, you know.

MsgJp:
覚者も騎士団みたいにビシッと組織にした方が
いいって意見もあるけど――
どうなんだろうね
MsgEn:
There are also opinions that it would be better 
to organize the Arisen like a knight order and 
be more organized.
I wonder how that would be.

MsgJp: あ、わたしは深く考えない派なので、よろしく！
MsgEn:
Ah, I'm not the type to think deeply, so, 
nice to meet you!

MsgJp:
白竜様が力を取り戻すまで
わたしたちが世の理を守らねばなりません
MsgEn:
Until Lord White Dragon regains his power,
we must protect the order of the world.

MsgJp:
特に、覚者の皆さんの責任は重大です
白竜様のご期待をゆめゆめお忘れなく
MsgEn:
In particular, the responsibility of 
all the Arisen is significant. 
Please never forget the 
expectations of Lord White Dragon.

MsgJp:
他の連中とも話して
顔を覚えてもらうんだな
MsgEn:
I'll talk to the others
and make sure they remember your face.

MsgJp:
レオがこんなに世話をやくなんて
どういう風の吹き回しだろうね
よっぽどあんたが気に入ったらしいよ
MsgEn:
Leo is really taking care of you.
I wonder what's got into him.
Seems like he really likes you.

MsgJp: あのさぁ――
MsgEn: Hey, you know...

MsgJp:
神殿以外にも《拠点》があるのは
知っているよね？
MsgEn:
Did you know that there are 
other locations outside of the temple?

MsgJp:
村だったり、特別な施設があったり――
そこの住人が助けを求めていたり――
MsgEn:
It could be a village, or a special facility,
where the residents are looking for help--

MsgJp:
いろいろあるから、時間があるなら
あちこち行ってみた方がいいよ
MsgEn:
There's a lot going on, so if you have the time,
you should go all over the place.

MsgJp:
ここんところジョゼフ様が老け込んじゃって
結構重要な仕事を任せてもらえるようになったんだ
MsgEn:
Master Joseph has been getting old these days,
so I've been entrusted with quite important tasks.

MsgJp:
うれしいけど――重圧もあってさ――
時々、話しを聞いてくれるとうれしいな
MsgEn:
I'm glad you're here -- 
but I'm also under a lot of pressure.
I'd love it if you'd talk to me from time to time.

MsgJp:
レオに期待されるということは――
危険な場所に行く機会が多いということだ
精進と用心を忘れなさんな
MsgEn:
What Leo expects is that you have a lot 
of opportunities to go to dangerous places.
Do not forget diligence and caution.

MsgJp:
オークどもとの戦争が続く限り
背中を預け合って戦う機会がすぐに来る
貴殿の力はその時に見せてもらおう
MsgEn:
As long as the war with the Orcs continues,
the opportunity to fight 
shoulder to shoulder will come soon.
I look forward to seeing your strength 
at that time.

MsgJp:
白竜様は一日の多くを眠って過ごしますが
ごくわずかながらお目覚めの時もあります
そんな時は、お話だってできますよ
MsgEn:
Lord White Dragon spends much of the day sleeping,
but there are also moments when he wakes up,
and during those times, 
he can have a conversation with you.

MsgJp:
まあ、最初のうちは言われるがままに
戦っていればいいさ
MsgEn:
Well, in the beginning, 
just do as you're told and fight.

MsgJp:
そのうち、自分なりの生き方が
見えてくるはずだ
MsgEn:
Eventually, 
you should be able to see your own way of living.

MsgJp: どれどれどれ？
MsgEn: Hmm, I wonder...

MsgJp:
レオはあんたのどこが気に入ったのかな？
それともただの気まぐれか――なんてね
MsgEn:
What does Leo like about you?
Or is it just a whim?

MsgJp: 君はどんな覚者人生を歩むんだろうね
MsgEn:
I wonder what kind of life as an 
Arisen you will lead.

MsgJp:
冒険者みたいな生き方もいいけど
僕としては神殿のために尽力して欲しい――
MsgEn:
You can live like an adventurer,
but for my part, 
I want you to do your best for the temple--

MsgJp: いや、最近、少ないんだよね、そういう覚者
MsgEn: No, there aren't many of those Arisen these days.

MsgJp:
ここで見聞したことを外で話す時は
その判断を慎重に行うようにな
MsgEn:
Be careful about your judgment when 
talking about what you have seen here outside.

MsgJp:
秘密は可能な限り少なくしたいが
内容によってはそうもいかん
MsgEn:
I want to minimize the secretkeeping 
as much as possible, 
but depending on the subject, 
it may not be possible.

MsgJp:
どうした？　時間を持て余しているのなら
オークの一匹でも倒してくるがいい
MsgEn:
What's wrong? If you're just wasting time, 
go ahead and defeat even one Orc.

MsgJp:
戦士に大切なことは
百の無駄口より剣のひと振り――忘れるな
MsgEn:
The important thing for a warrior is 
the swing of a sword, not empty words――
don't forget.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：マイ拠点の登録方法】
MsgEn: 【Hint: How to Register a Favorite】

MsgJp: ①各拠点に設置された《拠点の礎》に触れて解放
MsgEn:
Touch the "Portcrystal" placed at 
each location to unlock it.

MsgJp:
②タッチアクションから《マイ拠点に登録》を選択
※以降《リム転移》でいつでも瞬間移動できます
MsgEn:
Select "Register to My Favorites" 
from the touch action.
※ Afterwards, you can teleport 
instantly using "Rift Teleport" at any time.

MsgJp: 帰還、遠距離移動には《リム転移》が便利です
MsgEn:
Rift Teleport, or "Rift Teleportation," 
is useful for returning and long-distance travel.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：リム転移の使い方】
MsgEn: 【Hint: How to use Rift Teleport】

MsgJp: ①ゲームメニューのワールドで《リム転移》を選択
MsgEn: Select "Rift Teleport" in the Game Menu's World.

MsgJp:
②移動したい場所を選択
※白竜神殿への帰還はノーコストです
MsgEn:
Select the location you want to move to.
※Returning to the White Dragon Temple is free of cost.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：スポット情報の見方】
MsgEn: 【Hint: How to read spot information】

MsgJp:
採取アイテムや討伐対象の魔物を探すには、
エリアマスターの《スポット情報》が便利です
MsgEn:
To search for items and 
target monsters for suppression,
the Area Master's "Spot Info" is convenient.

MsgJp: ①《エリア情報》から《スポット情報》を選択
MsgEn: Select "Spot Info" from "Area Information".

MsgJp:
②スポット情報で、「入手可能アイテム」と
　「魔物情報」を確認
MsgEn:
In the spot information, 
check the "Available Items" and "Enemies".

MsgJp: テル村の場所は地図で確認してくれ
MsgEn:
Please check the location 
of Tel Village on the map.

MsgJp:
白竜様はまどろみの中――
お変わりはありません
MsgEn:
Lord White Dragon is in a slumber―― 
No changes have occurred.

MsgJp:
白竜は自らを守るために
大勢の覚者を生み出した――
MsgEn:
The White Dragon, in order to protect itself, 
gave birth to a multitude of Arisen――

MsgJp:
白竜自身の言葉だから
異論を唱えるものは誰もいない
MsgEn:
Because it is the White Dragon's own words,
there is no one who voices dissent.

MsgJp:
これは太古の昔から竜とともに戦ってきた
白衛騎士団を否定するものではないのだが
面白くないと思っている騎士もおり――
MsgEn:
This is not to deny the White Guard Knights, 
who have fought alongside dragons since ancient 
times, but some knights find it boring――

MsgJp: おまけに思い上がった覚者も少なくはない
MsgEn:
Moreover, 
there are also quite a few arrogant Arisen.

MsgJp:
わたしから見ると実にくだらない反目だが
だからといって鼻で笑うわけにもいかない
厄介な問題――というわけだ
MsgEn:
From my perspective, it's a truly trivial rivalry,
but that doesn't mean I can just laugh it off.
It's a troublesome issue—that's the gist of it.

MsgJp: ふふふ――
MsgEn: Hmmm--

MsgJp:
大きな仕事を任せてもらえそうなんだ
正式に決まったら話すよ
MsgEn:
I feel like I might be entrusted with a big job.
I'll talk about it once it's officially decided.

MsgJp: ガルドリンのところへ行くんだって？
MsgEn: I heard you're going to Gurdolin's place?

MsgJp:
あのおっさん、言われるほど面倒な人じゃ
ないと思うんだよね
かばう気は全然ないけどさ
MsgEn:
I don't think that old man is as 
troublesome as people say. 
I don't have any intent of defending him though.

MsgJp: こんにちは
MsgEn: Greetings.

MsgJp:
あら？　さっき、そこに優しそうな顔の
青年がいませんでしたか？
MsgEn:
Oh? Didn't I see a young man with a kind face 
over there just now?

MsgJp:
優先権を主張するなら
さっさと終わらせてみやがれ
MsgEn:
If you're claiming priority,
finish it quickly!

MsgJp: 俺たちに任せればすぐに終わりだ
MsgEn: If you let us handle it, it'll be over soon.

MsgJp:
まずは調査を終えてからだ
それくらいわからんのか！？
MsgEn:
First, finish the investigation.
Do you not understand that much!?

MsgJp: 順序、秩序は貴殿らにはないのか！？
MsgEn: Do you not have order or discipline?!

MsgJp:
時間の無駄だ！
おまえらの相手をしているひまなどない！
MsgEn:
What a waste of time! 
I don't have time to deal with you!

MsgJp: 覚者はなめられたら終わりだぞ、新入り
MsgEn:
Underestimating the Arisen will be your downfall, 
newcomer.

MsgJp: こっちに任せればすぐに終わるってのによ！
MsgEn: If you leave it to me, it'll be over soon!

MsgJp:
くそっ――
なに？　詳しい事情が知りたい？
MsgEn:
Damn it--
What?　You want to know what's going on?

MsgJp:
だったらこの村の黒ブドウ亭にいる
アルフレドから聞くんだな
MsgEn:
In that case, 
ask Alfred at the Black Grape Inn in this village.

MsgJp: どうしてあんな奴が覚者なんだ！？
MsgEn: Why is someone like that an Arisen?!

MsgJp: おまえ、余計なことはするなよ
MsgEn: You, don't do anything you don't have to.

MsgJp:
貴君はレオの使者だな？
わたしからも状況を説明しておこう
MsgEn:
You are Leo's messenger, aren't you?
Let me explain the situation to you.

MsgJp:
村に魔物が出没するという問題に関連して
村はずれの廃屋から気味の悪い物音が
聞こえるという訴えがあった
MsgEn:
Related to the issue 
of monsters appearing in the village,
there have been reports of eerie sounds coming 
from an abandoned house 
on the outskirts of the village.

MsgJp:
棲みついた魔物がたてる音だろうと
我々は考えている
MsgEn: We think it's the sound of demons.

MsgJp:
すでにガルドリンには伝えてあるが
あの覚者は動こうとはしない
MsgEn:
I have already informed Gurdolin,
but that Arisen has no intention of moving.

MsgJp:
口汚く騎士たちを侮辱するだけだ
いったい何を考えているのか――
MsgEn:
He just insults the knights with his foul mouth.
What in the world does he think he's doing--?

MsgJp:
ともあれ、レオからの指示があるのだな？
それを尊重して、問題の解決を図ってくれ
差配は貴君に任せよう
MsgEn:
Anyway, Leo has given you instructions, right?
Respect them and try to solve the problem.
I'll leave it to you to make the difference.

MsgJp:
ところで、廃屋へゆく前に村の
《拠点の礎》に触れて解放しておいてくれ
礎を解放しリム転移が使えるようになれば
神殿とテルの往来も楽になるだろう
MsgEn:
By the way, before you go to the abandoned house, 
please touch the village's Portcrystal and unlock it. 
Once you unlock the Portcrystal and 
gain the ability to use Rift Teleport, 
it will be easier to travel between the temple and Tel.

MsgJp:
怪しい物音のする廃屋はハイデル教会の
司祭が、代々使っていた家だ
MsgEn:
The abandoned house with strange noises used to 
be the home of the priests of Hidell Church, 
passed down through generations.

MsgJp:
時代とともに教会の教えは廃れてしまい
やがて司祭も姿を消した
MsgEn:
Over time, the Church's teachings fell into disuse
and eventually the priests disappeared.

MsgJp:
しかも、最後の司祭が村を出るところを見た者が
誰もいなくてな――
MsgEn:
Moreover, there was nobody who saw the last 
priest leaving the village...

MsgJp:
気味の悪さと後ろめたさから
廃屋に近づく者はほとんどいない
MsgEn:
Due to the eerie feeling and guilt, 
very few people approach the abandoned house.

MsgJp:
今は魔物の巣窟となっていても不思議ではないと
わたしは思っている
MsgEn:
It is not strange that it has now become 
a den of monsters, I think.

MsgJp:
《廃屋の地下室》はどっちかって？
それなら村の西、そこにある《エテルナ装具屋》
の裏をまっすぐさ
MsgEn:
"Which way to the Abandoned House Cellar?"
If that's the case, 
go straight behind Eterna's Outfitter,
located in the west of the village.

MsgJp: しかし、あんな場所に何の用だい？
MsgEn: But what do you want in a place like that?

MsgJp:
ほう――
魔物は貴君が退治したのか
さすが、レオが見込んだ覚者だ
MsgEn:
Oh—
So you're the one who vanquished the monsters.
As expected, 
you're the Arisen Leo placed his trust in.

MsgJp:
あらためて自己紹介させてくれ
職はハイデル平原のエリアマスター
名はアルフレドだ
MsgEn:
Let me introduce myself again. 
My occupation is as an 
Area Master of Hidell Plains. 
My name is Alfred.

MsgJp:
長い付き合いになるだろう
よろしく頼む
MsgEn:
It will be a long-term relationship.
I'm counting on you.

MsgJp:
世話になったな
ガルドリンを連れて、神殿へ戻るがいい
後のことはわたしに任せてくれ
MsgEn:
I am grateful for your help.
Take Gurdolin and return to the temple.
Leave the rest to me.

MsgJp: おい、テル村の連中の話を聞いたか？
MsgEn:
Hey, have you heard about the 
folks from Tel Village?

MsgJp:
あいつら、賭けをしていやがったんだ
魔物を倒すのは覚者か騎士団か――でな
MsgEn:
They made a bet that the one who would defeat the 
demon would be the Arisen or 
the Knights of the Order.

MsgJp:
騎士団に賭けていたのはたったひとり
――村の若い女だ
MsgEn:
There was only one person who 
bet on the knight order
- a young woman from the village.

MsgJp:
魔物を倒したのは公式には騎士団
つまり、その女が金を全部受け取った
MsgEn:
The one who defeated the enemy was 
officially the Knight Order.
In other words, the woman received all the money.

MsgJp:
おれの想像だがガルドリンは女から
金をむしり取ったに違いない
となれば、まったく、悪党だよ、あいつは
MsgEn:
My guess is that Gurdolin has been extorting 
money from women.
 If that's the case, he's a real scoundrel.

MsgJp:
もっとも、この話は騎士団にとっても
恥ずべきことだから誰にも言えない
せめて、おまえに話すことで
うさを晴らさせてもらうぞ
MsgEn:
However, this story is a disgrace
even for the Knights, so I can't tell anyone.
But at least I will confide in you
to relieve my burden.

MsgJp:
手柄をそんなことに利用されて
腹を立てているんだろう？
MsgEn:
Are you upset that your accomplishments are being 
used for such a thing?

MsgJp: おかえりなさい
MsgEn: Welcome back.

MsgJp:
ガルドリンと一緒だったらしいね
ぼくはあの人が苦手でね――わかるだろ？
MsgEn:
I heard you were with Gurdolin.
I'm not very good with him - you know what I mean?

MsgJp: ある日突然出現した巨大建造物――
MsgEn: One day, a gigantic structure suddenly appeared -

MsgJp:
まだ正体は不明だが、あれを大石塊（アーク）と
呼ぶことにした、おまえも、覚えておくといい
MsgEn:
Although its true nature is still unknown, 
we have decided to call it the "The Ark". 
It would be wise for you to remember that as well.

MsgJp: ガルドリン、どうだった？
MsgEn: How was Gurdolin?

MsgJp:
ちょーっと押しが強いけれど
戦場じゃその方が頼りになるんだよね
仲良くしとくといいよ
MsgEn:
They might be a bit pushy,
but on the battlefield, they're reliable.
It's better to get along with them.

MsgJp: はぁ――たいくつたいくつ
MsgEn: Sigh—boring, so boring.

MsgJp:
嫌な予感がします――
メイリーフがたいくつすると
事件が起こるんです――
MsgEn:
I have a bad premonition...
When Mayleaf gets bored,
an incident will occur...

MsgJp:
おお、戻ったか
ご苦労だったな
MsgEn:
Oh, you're back.
Thanks for your help.

MsgJp:
テル村での事の次第は
ガルドリンから報告を受けたところだ
MsgEn:
I just got a report from
Gurdolin on what happened in Tel Village.

MsgJp:
魔物を倒したのに騎士団の顔を立てようと
手柄を譲った――
MsgEn:
Even though you defeated the monster, 
you let the knights take credit to save face.

MsgJp:
まあ、わからないでもない
命令とは全然違うことをしたわけだからな
MsgEn:
Well, I can see why you feel that way. 
After all, you did something completely different 
from what you were ordered to do.

MsgJp:
いや、もう何も言うな
この件は忘れよう
悪いことをしたわけじゃない
MsgEn:
No, please don't say anything anymore. 
Let's forget about this matter. 
You didn't do anything wrong.

MsgJp:
さて――おまえの留守中、考えていたのだが
覚者としてもうひと皮むけるために
ポーンとの契約に挑んでみないか？
MsgEn:
Now, while you were away, I was thinking
that in order to further evolve as an Arisen,
why don't you try entering into a 
contract with a Pawn?

MsgJp:
彼らは主人となる覚者に絶対の忠誠を誓う
怖れ知らずの戦人（いくさびと）だ
MsgEn:
They pledge absolute loyalty to the Arisen 
who becomes their master.
They are fearless warriors.

MsgJp:
加えて、彼らの物作りの能力は
鋭い剣、強固な鎧――
おまえに様々な装具をもたらすだろう
MsgEn:
In addition, their craftsmanship abilities will
bring you sharp swords, solid armor--
a variety of accoutrements!

MsgJp: もちろん、そう簡単に親しくなれるわけじゃない
MsgEn: Of course, it's not easy to become close friends.

MsgJp:
契約の手順など具体的なことは
イリスに聞いてくれ
MsgEn:
As for specific details such as the procedure for 
the contract, please ask Iris.

MsgJp:
ああ――
この謁見の間を出た大階段の下の広場で
ファビオやキャメロンが、お前を待っていたぞ
MsgEn:
Ah――
In the plaza beneath the grand staircase, 
after leaving the Audience Chamber,
Fabio and Cameron were waiting for you.

MsgJp:
奴らの用事が済んだら
また俺のところに顔を出してくれ
MsgEn:
Once your business is done,
please come and visit me again.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：遠方への冒険準備】
MsgEn: 【Hint: Preparation for Distant Adventures】

MsgJp:
遠方へ向かう前は、保管ボックスや商店で
装備を整えましょう
※保管ボックスの《報酬受け取り》から
　LV.5用武器を入手し、装備しましょう
MsgEn:
Before heading off into the distance, let's 
prepare equipment at the Storage Box and shops.
※Obtain a LV.5 weapon from the "Rewards Received" 
in the Storage Box and equip it.

MsgJp:
テル村へはリム転移を使えばすぐに行けるよ
そこでエリアマスターのアルフレドと会う
MsgEn:
You can quickly go to Tel Village 
using Rift Teleport.
There, you will meet the Area Master, Alfred.

MsgJp:
そして《ポーン郷》へ行く
まずは、そこからだね
MsgEn:
And then you'll go to the《Pawn Cathedral.》
That's a good place to start.

MsgJp:
あなたはどんなポーンと出会うのでしょうね
わたしも楽しみです
MsgEn:
What kind of Pawns will you encounter, I wonder? 
I'm looking forward to it as well.

MsgJp:
ほう、ポーンと契約する気になったのか
ふむ、それでこそ覚者だ
MsgEn:
Oh, so you've decided 
to make a contract with the Pawns. 
Well, that's what it truly means to be an Arisen.

MsgJp:
ふふふ――
どうやら本決まりになりそうなんだ
例の話――
MsgEn:
Hehehe—
Looks like it's going to be official.
That thing we talked about—

MsgJp: ああ、話したい！　しゃべってしまいたい！
MsgEn: Oh, I want to talk! I want to speak!

MsgJp: この先は行き止まりだ
MsgEn: It's a dead end.

MsgJp:
前の大水で橋が流されてな
復旧の目処はまったく立っていない
――どこへ行くつもりなんだ？
MsgEn:
The bridge was washed away in the previous flood,
and there is no prospect of restoration at all.
Where do you intend to go?

MsgJp:
なるほど、《ポーン郷》か
ならば一度、引き返すことをすすめるよ
MsgEn:
I see... Pawn Cathedral.
Then I suggest you turn around and go back.

MsgJp:
テル村へ行ってアルフレドに相談するといい
確か、村から森の方へ抜けられる道が
あったはずだ
MsgEn:
It would be a good idea to go to Tel Village and 
consult with Alfred. 
I remember there was a path that leads 
from the village to the forest.

MsgJp: 橋はいつ直るのかって？
MsgEn: When will the bridge be repaired?

MsgJp:
さあな――ミスリウの森の材木があれば
良いのだろうが――
ここまで木を運ぶのはかなり大変だ
MsgEn:
I don't know--
Well, I suppose it would be good to have lumber 
from the Mysree Forest. 
But it's quite difficult to 
transport it all the way here.

MsgJp:
《ポーン郷》方面はしばらくのあいだ
テル村経由で行くしかないだろうな
MsgEn:
The area around the Pawn Cathedral will probably 
have to be reached through Tel Village for a while.

MsgJp:
おお、貴君は――
いつぞやはご苦労だったな
MsgEn:
Oh, you--
I'm sorry to hear about your 
troubles the other day.

MsgJp:
あらためて挨拶をさせてもらおう
わたしはハイデル平原のエリアマスター
覚者のアルフレドだ
MsgEn:
Let me greet you again.
I am the Area Master of the Hidell Plains,
Alfredo the Arisen.

MsgJp:
知っていると思うがエリアマスターとは
担当地区を取り仕切る監督官のことだ
MsgEn:
I think you already know, but an Area Master is 
the supervisor who oversees a designated area.

MsgJp:
さて――
我々エリアマスターは、エリアを訪れる覚者に対し
情報の提供や、アイテムの支給を行っている
MsgEn:
Now then―― 
As Area Masters, we provide information and 
supply items to the Arisen who visit our areas.

MsgJp:
また、エリアの名声度
――つまり、《エリアランク》が高い者に対しては
封鎖された場所への立入許可を
与えることもできるのだ
MsgEn:
Furthermore, for individuals with high area fame,
in other words, a high "Area Rank",
access permits to sealed areas 
can also be granted.

MsgJp:
貴君は今、《ポーン郷》へ行きたいのだろう？
ならば、丁度良い
MsgEn:
Do you want to go to Pawn Cathedral now?
In that case, it's just perfect.

MsgJp:
以前レオの使者として貴君がここに来た時の
活躍は十分評価に値する
MsgEn:
The achievements you made when you came here 
before as an envoy of Leo are highly commendable.

MsgJp:
その礼として、封鎖エリアの一つを
開放しようではないか
MsgEn:
As a token of gratitude, how about we
open up one of the sealed areas?

MsgJp:
《ポーン郷》へと続く《狩人の抜け穴》を
貴君が通れるようにしておこう
やや危険だが、貴君なら問題ないだろう
MsgEn:
I will ensure that you can pass through the 
Hunters' Secret Passage 
that leads to the Pawn Cathedral. 

It may be somewhat dangerous, 
but I'm sure you will be able to handle it.

MsgJp:
では、わたしに話しかけ直して
《エリア情報》を選び
エリアランクとその内容を確認してくれ
MsgEn:
Then, please speak to me again and choose 
"Area Information." 
Confirm the Area Rank and its contents for me.

MsgJp:
さあ――、わたしに話しかけ直して
《エリア情報》を選び
エリアランクとその内容を確認してくれ
MsgEn:
Come on-- please speak to me again and choose 
"Area Information." 
Confirm the Area Rank and its contents for me.

MsgJp:
これで《狩人の抜け穴》は開放された
魔物が多いから気をつけてくれ
MsgEn:
With this, 
the Hunters' Secret Passage has been opened.
Be careful, as there are many enemies.

MsgJp:
《狩人の抜け穴》に出る魔物やアイテムの
情報は、《エリア情報》の《スポット情報》
で確認していくといいだろう
MsgEn:
It is recommended to check the information on the 
monsters and items that appear in 
Hunters' Secret Passage in the "Area Information" 
and "Spot Information."

MsgJp:
それから――
エリアポイントを貯めたら、また足を運んでくれ
話しかけてくれれば、ポイントを精査して
相応しい恩賞を与えよう
MsgEn:
And then――
When you accumulate area points, 
please come back again.

If you talk to me, 
I will carefully examine the points
and give you a suitable reward.

MsgJp:
ああ――
恩賞はエリアの開放だけではない
ポイントの多寡によって様々な恩賞を考えている
励みになるだろう？
MsgEn:
Ah-...
The reward is not only the opening of the area.
I am considering various rewards based on the 
number of points.
It will be encouraging, won't it?

MsgJp: 狩人の抜け穴は開放してもらえた？
MsgEn: Was the Hunter's Secret Passage opened up for use?

MsgJp: だったらポーン郷へ行っちゃおう！
MsgEn: In that case, let's go to Pawn Cathedral!

MsgJp:
これはこれは、新しき覚者さま
お待ち申しておりました
ここは我らポーンの民が集いし《ポーン郷》
MsgEn:
Greetings, greetings, esteemed new Arisen.
We have been eagerly awaiting your arrival.
This is the gathering place of our Pawn 
community, the "Pawn Cathedral".

MsgJp:
里長アルヴァーさまは聖堂の奥におられます
――が、まずは左手にある《拠点の礎》を開放し
登録なさいませ
MsgEn:
Master Alvar is located deep within the cathedral.
- First, unlock the Portcrystal on your left hand 
side and register it.

MsgJp:
契約の試練に行かれるにも準備をなさるにも
覚者さまの拠点としてきっとお役に立つでしょう
MsgEn:
Whether you are going to the 
Trial of the Contract 
or preparing for it, I'm sure it will be useful 
as the base of the Arisen.

MsgJp:
《ポーン郷》へようこそ
わたしはここの管理人アルヴァー
MsgEn:
Welcome to the Pawn Cathedral.
I am the caretaker of this place, Alvar.

MsgJp:
さて、覚者よ
貴君はまだポーンについて何も知るまい
MsgEn:
Now, O Arisen,
you may not yet know anything about Pawns.

MsgJp:
――気にするな
最初は誰でも同じだ
そんなことで我々ポーンは貴君を
見限ったりはしない
MsgEn:
Don't worry about it.
At first, everyone is the same.
We Pawns won't abandon you
just because of something like that.

MsgJp:
――いや、見限るなど、できないのだ
ポーンには己の意志や感情がない
欲望、野望――何もなく、ただ覚者の
意志に従うのみ
MsgEn:
No, it's impossible to abandon them.
Pawns have no will or emotions of their own.
No desires, ambitions—nothing,
they simply follow the will of the Arisen.

MsgJp: ポーンは異界から来た不倒の戦士だ
MsgEn:
Pawns are unyielding warriors who have come 
from a different realm.

MsgJp:
けして死ぬことはなく――
ただ、異界に帰り、また復活する
その特性から我らを“異界渡り”と呼ぶ者もいる
MsgEn:
There is no such thing as dying.
Instead, we return to the other world and revive.
Some even call us "otherworld travelers" 
because of this characteristic.

MsgJp:
そして、ポーンの能力が発揮されるのは
戦場だけではない
MsgEn:
And it's not just on the
battlefield that the pawn's abilities come into play.

MsgJp:
《クラフト》の能力で貴君ら覚者のために
様々な装具を生み出すだろう
MsgEn:
They will use their ability of "Craft" to create 
various equipment for you, noble Arisen.

MsgJp:
ポーンとの契約を望む者は
《異界の狭間》へ行かねばならぬが
それが許されるのは一時にただひとりだけ
MsgEn:
Those who wish to make a contract with Pawns
must go to "The Rift".
But only one person is allowed to do so at a time.

MsgJp:
準備と覚悟ができているのなら
あらためて声をかけてくれ
MsgEn:
If you are prepared and ready,
please reach out to me again.

MsgJp:
ん？　準備できたら教えてね
君に足りないのは経験だけだよ
MsgEn:
Hmm?　Let me know when you're ready.
All you're missing is experience.

MsgJp:
クラウスが帰還を渋るかもしれん
その時は――
MsgEn:
Klaus may be reluctant to return.
If that happens--

MsgJp:
すぐに第二次調査団を派遣すると
伝えてくれんか
MsgEn:
Can you inform them to dispatch
the second investigation team immediately?

MsgJp:
嫌な予感がしてな――
ウソも方便だ
MsgEn:
I have a bad feeling about this-- 
But sometimes, a lie can be a useful tool.

MsgJp:
ここで何をしている
調査団はまだ戻らないのか？
MsgEn:
What are you doing here? 
Hasn't the investigation team returned yet?

MsgJp: 皆さんが無事に帰還しますように――
MsgEn: May everyone return safely -

MsgJp: お――あんたが来たのか――
MsgEn: Oh... you're here...

MsgJp: くそっ――不覚だ――
MsgEn: Damn it... I underestimated it...

MsgJp:
見たことのない敵がいるぞ――
気をつけろ――
MsgEn:
There's an enemy I've never seen before--
Watch out--

MsgJp:
クラウスたちは――奥だ――
もっと奥に――
MsgEn:
Klaus and the others--back there--
further in--

MsgJp: ――急いで
MsgEn: --Hurry.

MsgJp: 気をつけて――
MsgEn: Be careful...

MsgJp: ほら、集中して
MsgEn: Come on, focus.

MsgJp: 調査が――
MsgEn: The investigation--

MsgJp: うう――まだまだ
MsgEn: Ugh--there's more.

MsgJp: ここに――残ろう――
MsgEn: Let's—stop here—

MsgJp:
世話になったな
実はアークの中に一歩入った瞬間から
嫌な予感がしていたんだ
MsgEn:
You've been a great help.
Actually, I've had a bad feeling
since I stepped into the Ark.

MsgJp:
しかし、好奇心に負けた
イリスが引き返すべきだと言い出した時も
俺はクラウスに加勢してな
MsgEn:
But I succumbed to my curiosity. 
Even when Iris told us to turn back, 
I sided with Klaus.

MsgJp:
だから、もしクラウスが責任を問われるなら
俺も同罪だ
MsgEn:
So, if Klaus is held accountable, 
I am also guilty.

MsgJp:
ご苦労さまでした
オークの臭いを強く感じたのは
ほんの一瞬――
MsgEn:
Thank you for your hard work.
I only briefly sensed the smell of Orc—

MsgJp: こちらは何事もなくホッとしていたところです
MsgEn:
We were just relieved that 
everything was alright here.

MsgJp:
調査報告をまとめないと――
ジョゼフ様にすごく急かされてるんだ
MsgEn:
I need to summarize the research report... 
Joseph is really rushing me.

MsgJp:
深刻な傷を負った者はいないと聞いている
良かった――と言うべきなのだろうな
MsgEn:
I heard that no one has suffered serious wounds.
I guess it's a relief.

MsgJp: 調査団は先程、神殿に帰還したところだ
MsgEn: The survey team just returned to the temple.

MsgJp:
アークでの出来事については
この後、ジョゼフと相談してみよう
MsgEn:
Regarding the events at the Ark,
let's consult with Joseph afterwards.

MsgJp: 準備できたら声を掛けてくれ
MsgEn: Give me a shout when you're ready.

MsgJp:
一緒にやりたいこと、相談したいこと――
頼みたいことが山ほどある
MsgEn:
There are so many things I want to do with you, 
things I want to talk to you about-- 
so much I want to ask you for help with.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：アークへの調査について】
MsgEn: [Hint: Regarding the investigation into the Ark]

MsgJp: アーク内部の敵は非常に強敵です
MsgEn: Enemies inside The Ark are very formidable.

MsgJp: リムストーンでサポートポーンを追加雇用するか他の覚者と共に4人で挑みましょう
MsgEn:
You can hire additional Support Pawns at the 
Riftstone or challenge it together with other 
Arisen in a group of four.

MsgJp: ひとつ――頼まれてくれないか？
MsgEn: One thing - would you do me a favor?

MsgJp:
今朝からメイリーフの姿が
見えないんだ
MsgEn: I haven't seen Mayleaf since this morning.

MsgJp:
メイリーフはわかるだろう？
すばしっこい小さな女の子だ
MsgEn:
You know Mayleaf, don't you?
She's a quick little girl.

MsgJp: あの子の両親が古い知り合いでな――
MsgEn: Her parents are old acquaintances of mine--

MsgJp:
その死の間際に
メイリーフを託されたんだ
MsgEn:
At the moment of their death,
I was entrusted with Mayleaf.

MsgJp:
あの子にもしものことがあったら
申し訳が立たない
MsgEn:
If something were to happen to that child,
I would feel extremely sorry.

MsgJp: ああ――
MsgEn: Ah—

MsgJp: 行き先はおそらく《ミスリウの森》――
MsgEn: The destination is probably "Mysree Forest" -

MsgJp:
〝森の精〟が呼んでいる――
そう呟いているのを聞いたことがある
MsgEn:
The spirit of the forest is calling--
I've heard it muttered.

MsgJp:
少々変わった子だ
それもあって心配なんだ
MsgEn:
She's a bit of a strange one.
That's part of what worries me.

MsgJp:
頼む――
メイリーフを保護してくれ
MsgEn:
Please, I beg you――
Please protect Mayleaf for me.

MsgJp:
メイリーフは《ミスリウの森》だと思う
頼んだぞ
MsgEn:
I think Mayleaf is in Mysree Forest.
I'm counting on you.

MsgJp:
メイリーフは特別な子です
どうか連れ戻してください
MsgEn:
Mayleaf is a special child.
Please bring her back!

MsgJp:
メイリーフのことになると
ジョゼフ様は人が変わるんだ
冷静じゃいられないというか――
MsgEn:
When it comes to Mayleaf,
Master Joseph becomes a different person.
Or rather, he can't stay calm...

MsgJp:
あら！？
あなたもメイリーフを探してくださるの？
それは心強いです！
MsgEn:
Oh!?
Are you also searching for Mayleaf?
That's reassuring!

MsgJp:
あのね――あきらめようと思ったけど
こんなことになっちゃったから
思い切ってお願いしちゃいますね
MsgEn:
You know... I thought about giving up,
but since it turned out like this,
I'll muster up the courage and make a request.

MsgJp:
この森にはわたしの大切な場所があって
どうしてもそこに寄って行きたいんです
MsgEn:
There is a precious place for me in this forest,
and I really want to go there no matter what.

MsgJp: 洞窟を出て、滝の流れる川の近く――
MsgEn:
After leaving the cave, 
near a river where a waterfall flows...

MsgJp:
ひとりでも行けるけど、きっとダメですよね？
だから覚者さんも来てください――
そこで待っていますから
MsgEn:
I can go alone, but I guess it's no good, right?
So please, Ser Arisen, come as well —
I'll be waiting for you there.

MsgJp:
察するに――
メイリーフ嬢は貴殿と話したいようだ
MsgEn:
From what I gather...
It seems that Mayleaf wants to speak to you, sir.

MsgJp:
わたしへの遠慮は無用――
さらに言えば、願ったり叶ったり――だな
MsgEn:
Don't hold back on me-- 
in fact, this is exactly what I've been hoping for!

MsgJp:
わたし、先に行ってます！
外の、滝の近くですよ？
MsgEn:
I'm going ahead! 
Near the waterfall outside, right?

MsgJp:
ふむ――
メイリーフ嬢の、我々への信頼に応えて
ここでの見聞は他言無用としようではないか
MsgEn:
Hmm...

In order to meet Mayleaf's trust in us,
let's keep what we see and hear here a secret.

MsgJp:
ジョゼフ様はご立腹だよね
心配かけちゃったからね――
MsgEn:
Master Joseph seems to be angry, right?
Because we made him worry...

MsgJp: ああ、キースヒルトのことは内緒にしてね？
MsgEn: Ah, please keep Kieshildt a secret, okay?

MsgJp:
あの子を連れ帰ったことは
覚者の手柄になるのかね
まあ、どうでもいいが
MsgEn:
Is it considered an achievement
for an Arisen to bring back that child?
Well, it doesn't really matter.

MsgJp:
またお世話になりましたね
メイリーフもあなたに心を開いているようです
MsgEn:
Thank you again for your help. 
It seems that Mayleaf has also opened up to you.

MsgJp:
もし良ければこれからも
親しくしてやってくださいね
MsgEn:
If it's alright, please continue to
be a friend for her from now on.

MsgJp:
メイリーフ――
とてもよく似た子をガキの頃に
見たことがあるが――
親戚か何かかもな
MsgEn:
Mayleaf... 
I feel like I've seen a girl who looks very 
similar when I was a child... 
Maybe she was a relative or something.

MsgJp:
今回はお役目を果たすことができたが――
次はどうなることやら
MsgEn:
This time, I was able to fulfill my duty, but... 
who knows what will happen next?

MsgJp:
メイリーフが戻ったようですね
ご苦労さまでした
MsgEn:
It seems Mayleaf has returned.
Thank you for your hard work.

MsgJp:
え？　ああ、メイリーフが戻ったんだ
良かった良かった
MsgEn:
Huh? Oh, Mayleaf has returned. 
I'm glad, I'm glad.

MsgJp:
ごめん、報告書のことを考えていて――
最近寝ても覚めてもそればかりで――
MsgEn:
I'm sorry, I've been thinking about the report--
Lately, 
it's all I can think about, even when I sleep--

MsgJp:
ご苦労だった
これでメイリーフの件は一件落着だ
MsgEn:
It was hard work.
With this, the matter of Mayleaf is finally resolved.

MsgJp:
ところで――
何も言わずに聞いて欲しい
MsgEn:
By the way,
I want you to listen without saying anything.

MsgJp:
おまえはあの子に慕われているようだ
だから、メイリーフから、自分の生い立ち
あるいは、来歴めいたことを聞いたかもしれない
MsgEn:
It seems that child is fond of you. 
So, you might have heard from Mayleaf about my 
background or some kind of history.

MsgJp: しかし、何を知っていようと他言しないでくれ
MsgEn: But whatever you know, don't tell anyone else.

MsgJp:
誰が知っていて
誰が知らないのか――
MsgEn: Who knows and who doesn't--

MsgJp: その詮索もしてはならない
MsgEn: You must not pry into such matters.

MsgJp:
いいな？　それがメイリーフのためだ
わかってくれるな？
MsgEn:
Okay?　It's for Mayleaf's sake.
Do you understand?

MsgJp:
頑張りはいつか報われ
道は自ずと姿を現す
常に前向きにな
MsgEn:
Hard work will be rewarded someday.
The path will reveal itself naturally.
Always stay positive.

MsgJp:
【ヒント：メイリーフの行方調査について】
調査で出向く《ミスリウ森林》エリアへは長旅となる可能性があります
最寄りのショップで装備を見直し、ポーン郷を拠点に向かいましょう
MsgEn:
【Hint: Investigating Mayleaf's whereabouts】
There is a possibility that the journey to 
the "Mysree Forest" area, 
where the investigation is conducted, 
will be a long one.

Review your equipment at the nearest store and head to your base in Pawn Township.

MsgJp:
【ヒント：ミスリウ森林について】
メイリーフが行方不明になったミスリウ森林は
リンウッドの村を拠点にルートが複数あるので有効活用しましょう
MsgEn:
【Hint: About the Mysree Forest】
The Mysree Forest, where Mayleaf went missing, 
has multiple routes converging in Lynwood village,
 so let's make good use of them.

MsgJp: イリスを見かけなかったか？
MsgEn: Have you seen Iris?

MsgJp:
アークでの失敗を気にしていたようだが
まったく――らしくない話だ
MsgEn:
It seems like they were worried 
about the failure at the Ark, 
but this is completely unlike them.

MsgJp:
もし会ったら、おれのところに顔を出すように
伝えてくれ
おれは何も気にしていないとな
MsgEn:
If you meet them, 
please let them know to come visit me. 
I'm not concerned about anything.

MsgJp: イリスはどこにいるのでしょう
MsgEn: Where could Iris be?

MsgJp:
どのような生き方を選ぶも自由ですが
たまには顔を見せて欲しいですね
MsgEn:
You are free to choose any way of life, but 
I would like to see your face every now and then.

MsgJp: あの笑顔は皆の心を明るくしますからね
MsgEn: That smile brightens everyone's heart.

MsgJp:
報告書がまだだというのにクラウスめ
ここで何をしている――
MsgEn:
Klaus, you still haven't finished the report. 
What are you doing here?

MsgJp:
君は――キノザの村って
知ってるかな？
MsgEn: Do you know about Kinoza Village?

MsgJp:
ここから、ずっとずっと
東へ行ったところなんだけど――
MsgEn: From here, if you keep going east...

MsgJp:
そこに心身ともに癒やしてくれる
温泉があるんだ
MsgEn:
There's a hot spring there
that heals both body and soul.

MsgJp:
イリスはそこにいるんじゃないかと思う
前にさ、落ち込んだりした時はそこへ行くって
言ってたのを覚えてるんだ
MsgEn:
I think Iris might be there,
she said before that she would go there when she 
was feeling down.

MsgJp:
ねえ、迎えに行ってくれないかな？
報告書の完成にはイリスの協力が
必要なんだ
MsgEn:
Hey, could you pick her up? 
I need Iris's help to finish the report.

MsgJp:
いや、本当は、報告書はどうでもよくて
――よくはないけど、関係はなくて
ただ、あの弾けるような笑顔を
また見たいっていうか――
MsgEn:
No, actually, the report doesn't really matter -
well, it's not good, but it's unrelated.
I just... want to see that radiant smile again.

MsgJp:
調査団があんなことになったのは
僕のせいであってイリスは悪くない
そう、伝えたいんだ
MsgEn:
The reason the investigation team 
ended up like that is my fault, not Iris's.
Yes, I want to convey that.

MsgJp:
本当なら僕が行くべきだろうけど
ここを離れるわけにはいかないから――
ねえ、イリスを説得して連れ戻してよ
MsgEn:
I should be the one to go, 
but I can't leave here, so...
Hey, convince Iris and bring her back.

MsgJp:
頼むよ――
キノザの温泉からイリスを連れ戻してほしい
そろそろ復帰すべきだと君も思うだろ？
MsgEn:
Please, I beg you――
Bring back Iris from the Kinoza hot springs.
You must also think 
that it's time for her to return, right?

MsgJp: イリスはキノザ村にいるらしいな
MsgEn: It seems that Iris is in the village of Kinoza.

MsgJp:
キノザと言えば温泉だ
――まったく、のんきな奴だ
MsgEn:
Kinoza is a hot spring town.
--How carefree.

MsgJp:
おぉ、覚者さん！　ようこそキノザへ！
どうぞ当鉱泉でごゆるりと――え？
ふむふむ、人探しですと？
MsgEn:
Oh, welcome, Ser Arisen! Welcome to Kinoza! 
Feel free to relax at our hot springs... 
Oh? Hmm, you're looking for someone?

MsgJp:
女性の覚者？　よく見りゃ美人――
ああ、イリスさんですな！
確かにいらっしゃってますとも
MsgEn:
A female Arisen? 
And you look closely, she's quite beautiful... 
Oh, it's Iris! She's definitely here.

MsgJp:
あの方なら、ほら、正面の奥――
《豊穣の泉》にいらっしゃいますよ
そういえば少し思いつめた顔を
していたような――
MsgEn:
If it's her, look straight ahead—
they're at the "Spring of Abundance."
Come to think of it, she seemed a bit
troubled earlier.

MsgJp:
普段はカウンターで入浴鍵を
購入頂くんですが
今回は特別に入浴をサービスしましょう
浴場へ探しに行ってあげて下さいな
MsgEn:
Normally, 
you would purchase a bath key at the counter.
But this time, let's make an exception and 
provide the bath as a service.
Please go to the bathing area and look for her.

MsgJp:
イリスさんは見つかりましたんで？
《豊穣の泉》は正面の奥です
探しに行ってあげて下さいな
MsgEn:
Did you find Iris, ser?
The Spring of Abundance is straight ahead.
Please go and search for her.

MsgJp:
しかし、今日は覚者さんが
たくさんお見えですなぁ！
MsgEn:
However, there are many Arisen
here today, aren't there!

MsgJp: 俺はもう少しゆっくりしていくよ
MsgEn: I will take it a bit slower from now on.

MsgJp:
イリスさんと会えましたか！
探し人が見つかって何よりですな
MsgEn:
Did you meet Iris? 
It's really great that you found 
the person you were looking for.

MsgJp:
ところで、いいお湯だったでしょう？
ボルドの諸問題の方も
ぜひお力添えお願いしますよ！
今後ともごひいきに！
MsgEn:
By the way, 
the hot springs were nice, weren't they? 

We'd love to have your help with 
the various issues in Bordo. 

We kindly ask for your continued favor 
in the future!

MsgJp:
イリスが戻ったらしいな
――ふやけていなければいいが
MsgEn:
It seems like Iris has returned.
I hope she's not all soaked.

MsgJp: イリスはどうしたんだ？
MsgEn: What happened to Iris?

MsgJp:
深刻な顔をしているから声をかけたら
取り繕うように笑った
何か危うい感じがしたが――
MsgEn:
Because she had a serious expression on her face,
I approached and she forced a smile.
I felt a sense of unease, as if something was off...

MsgJp:
イリスを見かけたので話そうとしたら――
目を合わせてくれませんでした――
MsgEn:
I saw Iris and tried to talk to her--
and she wouldn't make eye contact with me-- 
I was so worried.

MsgJp: 初めてのことで――とても寂しいです
MsgEn:
It's very lonely to experience something for 
the first time.

MsgJp: イリスを連れ戻してくれたって！？
MsgEn: You brought Iris back for me!?

MsgJp: 準備できたら声を掛けてくれ
MsgEn: Give me a shout when you're ready.

MsgJp:
一緒にやりたいこと、相談したいこと――
頼みたいことが山ほどある
MsgEn:
There are so many things I want to do with you, 
things I want to talk to you about-- 
so much I want to ask you for help with.

MsgJp:
【ヒント：キノザ鉱泉について】
キノザ鉱泉は様々な人が集まる拠点です
新たな拠点としてマイ拠点に登録したり、ラウル武具工房などで装備を整えましょう
MsgEn:
【Hint: About Kinoza Mineral Springs】
Kinoza Mineral Springs is a gathering place for 
people from various walks of life.

Register it as your favorite location and equip 
yourself at Raul's Arms and Armor Workshop, 
among other things.

MsgJp:
こんにちは、覚者さん
あの――ええと――
MsgEn:
Hello, Ser Arisen.
Um... well...

MsgJp:
ここじゃジョゼフおじさまの
目が光っていて――
MsgEn: Here, Joseph's eyes are shining...

MsgJp:
《テラス》に来てください！
お願いします！
MsgEn:
Please come to the Terrace! 
If you would be so kind!

MsgJp:
《テラス》でお話ししたいんです
お願いします！
MsgEn: I'd like to talk to you on 《Terrace》please!

MsgJp:
メイリーフがすっかりなついたようだな
まあ、よろしく頼む
MsgEn:
Mayleaf seems to have taken a liking, huh.
Well, I'm counting on you.

MsgJp:
すっかりレオさんの片腕だね
いろんな情報が入ると思うけど――
僕にも流してくれるとうれしいよ
MsgEn:
You've become Ser Leo's right hand, huh?
I think a lot of information will come in, but...
I'd be happy if you could share it with me too.

MsgJp:
白竜様の眠りは今日もお深く――
竜力の回復、さぞ進むことでしょう
MsgEn:
Lord White Dragon's slumber is once again 
deep today - 
Surely the recovery of Dragon Force progresses.

MsgJp:
ええと――
わたし、また森へ行きたくて――
MsgEn: Um... I want to go back to the forest again...

MsgJp:
ミスリウの森の奥深くに
大切な場所があるの
MsgEn:
Deep within the forest of Mysree,
there is a precious place.

MsgJp:
でも、ちょっと怖いから
見張りをお願いしたくて――
MsgEn:
But, because I'm a little scared,
I want to ask for someone to stand guard...

MsgJp:
ううん、送ってくれなくてもいいの
きっとわたしの方が早く着くから
ミスリウの森の奥の、お墓で待ってるね
MsgEn:
No, you don't have to escort me.
I'm sure I'll get there faster on my own.
I'll wait at the tomb deep in the Mysree Forest.

MsgJp:
メイリーフがソワソワしているんです
また何か企んでいるのかも――
MsgEn:
Mayleaf seems restless.
Perhaps she is plotting something again...

MsgJp:
メイリーフ！？
メイリーフをお見かけしませんでしたか？
MsgEn:
Mayleaf!?
Have you seen Mayleaf around?

MsgJp:
あのね――
お友達に贈る、お花が欲しいんだ
覚者さん、探してくれる？
MsgEn:
You know...
I want a flower to give to my friend.
Will you help me find one, Ser Arisen?

MsgJp:
わたしったら、お花を忘れてくるなんて――
覚者さん、どこに咲いてるかな？
MsgEn:
Oh, I forgot to bring the flowers... 
Do you know where they're blooming, Ser Arisen?

MsgJp:
わあ、ありがとう！
あなたにお願いして良かった！
MsgEn:
Wow, thank you!
I'm glad I asked you!

MsgJp: ジョゼフおじさまにバレてないよね？
MsgEn: Uncle Joseph doesn't know, does he?

MsgJp:
もう、メイリーフったら――
姿が見えないと、叱られるのはわたしなのに――
MsgEn:
Oh, Mayleaf! 
If she's not around, 
I'm the one who gets in trouble.

MsgJp:
メイリーフがいなくなったとパメラが――
ああ、戻ったのですね？　安心しました
MsgEn:
Mayleaf is gone and Pamela... 
Ah, you've returned? I'm relieved.

MsgJp:
メイリーフはどこかに閉じ込めた方が
いいんじゃないかな
あ、冗談だよ、冗談！
MsgEn:
I think Mayleaf should be locked up somewhere...

Oh, I'm kidding, I'm kidding!

MsgJp: メイリーフが世話になったな
MsgEn: Mayleaf took care of you.

MsgJp:
おそらくすでに
知っているだろうが――
MsgEn: You probably already know this, but...

MsgJp:
あの子の正体は
他言しないでくれ
MsgEn:
The true identity of that child.
Please don't speak about it to others.

MsgJp:
誰が知っていて
誰が知らないのか――
MsgEn: Who knows and who doesn't--

MsgJp: その詮索もしてはならない
MsgEn: You must not pry into such matters.

MsgJp:
いいな
メイリーフのためだ
MsgEn:
Good. 
It's for Mayleaf.

MsgJp: 頼んだぞ
MsgEn: I'm asking you.

MsgJp:
おまえはもちろん最前線を楽しんでくれ
準備でき次第グリッテン砦へ急げ
MsgEn:
Of course, enjoy the front lines.
Hurry to Fort Gritten as soon as you're ready.

MsgJp:
どうやらグリッテン砦とは縁が深いようだな
存分に戦ってくれ
MsgEn:
Looks like you've got a strong 
connection to Fort Gritten.
Fight as hard as you can.

MsgJp:
ヴァネッサ殿の公平さは
すべての覚者が見習ってほしいものだ――
MsgEn:
Vanessa's fairness is something that all 
Arisen should emulate.

MsgJp:
ご武運をお祈りします
皆さん、ご無事で帰ってくださいね
MsgEn:
I pray for your fortunes of war. 
Everyone, please return safely.

MsgJp:
留守は居残り部隊にまかせて
心おきなく戦ってくるんだな
MsgEn:
Leave it to the remaining troops to hold the fort,
and fight without worry.

MsgJp: 一匹でも多く敵をぶっ倒して――
MsgEn: -Defeat as many enemies as possible--

MsgJp:
と言いたいところだけど
無事に帰ってくることが一番大事だからね
とにかく、気をつけて！
MsgEn:
I want to say it, but the most important thing 
is to come back safely.
Anyway, take care!

MsgJp: 遠征か――腕が鳴るな
MsgEn: An expedition, huh—my skills are itching for action.

MsgJp: オークども！　かかってこい！
MsgEn: Orcs!　Come and get it!

MsgJp: 来い！　こっちだ！
MsgEn: Come on!　This way!

MsgJp: どうした！　怖じ気づいたか！
MsgEn:
What's wrong! 
Are you scared!

MsgJp: おりゃあああああ！
MsgEn: Oryaaaaaah!

MsgJp: 覚者はどんどん行ってくれ！
MsgEn: Keep going, Arisen!

MsgJp: オーク、くせええ！
MsgEn: Stinking Orcs!

MsgJp: さっさと倒さないと臭いが染みつくぞ！
MsgEn: Need to defeat it quickly, or the smell will seep in!

MsgJp: ここはいいから！
MsgEn: Leave this to me!

MsgJp: 最前線はもっと先だ！
MsgEn: The front line is further ahead!

MsgJp: ヴァネッサさん、見ててください！
MsgEn: Vanessa, witness me!

MsgJp: ヴァネッサさん！　おれ、ここですよ！
MsgEn: Vanessa! I'm here!

MsgJp: 統率のお気に入りめ――調子のるなよ！
MsgEn:
The commander's favorite, huh—
don't get too cocky!

MsgJp: おまえになんか負けるか！
MsgEn: I'm not going to let you beat me!

MsgJp:
ここはもう大丈夫だ
救援に感謝する
引き続き、白竜を頼んだぞ
MsgEn:
We're good to go here.
Thanks for the rescue.
Keep up the good work, for the White Dragon!

MsgJp:
ふう――結構厳しかったよ――
ありがとう
MsgEn:
Whew--that was pretty tough--
Thanks!

MsgJp:
さーて、激戦の後は恒例の大掃除だ
オーク臭を洗い流さないとな！
MsgEn:
Well, after the fierce battle, 
it's time for the usual big cleanup.
Got to wash away that Orc smell!

MsgJp:
さすが覚者さんだ
あんた、大活躍だったな！
MsgEn:
As expected, it's the Arisen. 
You really made a great contribution!

MsgJp: ヴァネッサさん、見ていてくれたかなぁ――
MsgEn: Vanessa, I hope you've been watching--

MsgJp:
くぅ――やっぱり、おまえは強いな
目標にさせてもらうよ
MsgEn:
Damn--I knew you were strong.
I'll have to aim for you.

MsgJp:
身体と武具を洗わないと――
少々臭うな
MsgEn:
I need to wash my body and equipment...
It's starting to smell a bit.

MsgJp:
華々しい戦果――何よりだ
ご苦労だった
MsgEn:
A splendid achievement――
above all else, well done.

MsgJp:
オークとの戦いは果てが見えない――
終結のための知恵を出さねばな
MsgEn:
The battle with the Orcs seems endless--
We must come up with a plan for its end.

MsgJp:
心なしかレオが沈んでいるようですね
戦いは大勝利と聞きましたが――
MsgEn:
It seems like Leo is a bit down.
I heard that the battle was a great victory, but...

MsgJp:
いや、ご苦労さま
ゆっくり休むといいよ
MsgEn:
No, thank you for your hard work. 
Take your time to rest.

MsgJp:
ご苦労だった
後でいい――少し顔を貸してくれ
MsgEn:
You've worked hard.
Later—could you lend me your ear for a moment?

MsgJp: 準備できたら声を掛けてくれ
MsgEn: Give me a shout when you're ready.

MsgJp:
一緒にやりたいこと、相談したいこと――
頼みたいことが山ほどある
MsgEn:
There are so many things I want to do with you, 
things I want to talk to you about-- 
so much I want to ask you for help with.

MsgJp: 【ヒント：エリア封鎖解放】
MsgEn: [Hint: Area Blockade Released]

MsgJp: ハイデル関所が開放され、ダウ渓谷とハイデル平原の往来が可能になりました
MsgEn:
The Hidell Checkpoint has been opened, allowing 
passage between the Dowe Valley and the 
Hidell Plains.

MsgJp:
ドリード城内部は複雑だ
先行している騎士をマーカーで追い、情報を得ていくといい！命の器は地下にあるようだ
MsgEn:
The interior of Dreed Castle is complex. 
It would be good to follow the knights who are 
ahead of you with markers and gather information! 
The Vessel of Life seems to be located underground.

MsgJp: 一瞬でいい――
MsgEn: Just for a moment—

MsgJp:
俺たちが白竜の力を
継承できる程度でかまわない――
MsgEn:
It's okay if we can inherit
just a fraction of the White Dragon's power—

MsgJp:
それほどに白竜を目覚めさせるには
どうしたらよいのか――
MsgEn:
What should we do to awaken the White Dragon
to such an extent?

MsgJp:
ジョゼフはアークのことで頭がいっぱいだ
相談したら《ブラッドオーブ》を探せと言われた
おれが抱える焦りが伝わらないんだ
MsgEn:
Joseph is preoccupied with the Ark.
When I consulted him, 
he told me to find the "Blood Orb."
He doesn't seem to sense the urgency I feel.

MsgJp:
竜の覚醒――
方法は自分たちで探すしかないのか
MsgEn:
Awakening the Dragon--
We'll just have to find a way to do it ourselves.

MsgJp:
レオが深刻な顔をして
わたしを見ているのです
MsgEn: Leo is looking at me with a serious expression.

MsgJp: 何かありましたか？
MsgEn: Did something happen?

MsgJp: 白竜様の覚醒はいつか――
MsgEn:
When will the awakening of 
Lord White Dragon occur?

MsgJp:
わたしには、時が来たら
としかお答えできません
MsgEn: I can only answer when the time comes.

MsgJp:
わたしの仕事は
白竜様の意志を伝えること――
MsgEn:
My job is to convey
the will of Lord White Dragon.

MsgJp:
人々の願いの
代弁者ではないのです
MsgEn: I am not the spokesperson for people's desires.

MsgJp:
白竜の目を覚ます――
ふん、レオの差し金か
MsgEn:
Waking the white dragon--
Hmm, Leo sent you.

MsgJp:
あの眠りで竜力が回復するのだ
その邪魔をするつもりか？
MsgEn:
That sleep restores Dragon Force.
Are you going to interrupt that?

MsgJp: 賛成しかねるな
MsgEn: I cannot agree with that.

MsgJp: 何より、すべがなかろう
MsgEn: Above all, there's no way to do it.

MsgJp:
ねえ――
ゴブリンキングから手に入れた古文書！
あれの解読が終わったんだ
MsgEn:
Hey... I finished deciphering the ancient 
document we obtained from the Goblin King!

MsgJp: 竜の石化を解く方法を見つけたと思う
MsgEn:
I think I've found a way to undo the 
petrification of the dragon.

MsgJp: 試してみるかい？
MsgEn: Would you like to give it a try?

MsgJp:
もし、その気があったら
これから《ドリード城》へ向かってほしい
MsgEn:
If you're feeling up to it, 
I want you to head towards Dreed Castle.

MsgJp:
昔々、白騎団の本拠地だったところでね
今は色々な物の保管庫になっている
MsgEn:
Once upon a time, 
it was the stronghold of the White Knights.
Now, it has become a storage facility 
for various items.

MsgJp:
そうそう、今回の古文書だって元々は
ドリード城に保管されていたものだ
MsgEn:
Oh, that's right. Even this ancient document was 
originally stored in Dreed Castle.

MsgJp:
いや、保管というよりは
封じたという言い方が正しいかな
あそこには世に出ては困るものが
いっぱいある
MsgEn:
No, I think it's more accurate to say that it was 
sealed. 
There are a lot of things there that shouldn't 
be released into the world.

MsgJp:
というわけで、今回ばかりはジョゼフ様には
絶対秘密にして欲しい
MsgEn:
So, this time, I really need you to 
keep this a secret from Joseph.

MsgJp:
じゃあ、それぞれこっそり出発して、現地集合だ
これは城で使う鍵――
中できっと必要になるから渡しておくよ
MsgEn:
Well then, let's each secretly depart and 
meet up at the destination. 
This is the key used in the castle. 
I'm giving it to you because
we'll definitely need it inside.

MsgJp: ええと、あとは――
MsgEn: Um, as for the rest...

MsgJp:
そうそう、レオには君から話してほしい
また勝手な行動か、と思われたくないからね
MsgEn:
Oh, that's right. I want Leo to hear it from you. 
I don't want him to think I'm acting selfishly.

MsgJp:
レオへの報告を忘れないでくれよ
そして《ドリード城》で会おう！
MsgEn:
Don't forget to report to Leo
and let's meet at Dreed Castle!

MsgJp: 白竜の目を覚ます方法があれば――
MsgEn: If there is a way to awaken the White Dragon...

MsgJp:
ほう――クラウスとおまえでなんとかするだと？
《ドリード城》へ行く？
MsgEn:
Well... you and Klaus are going to work it out, 
aren't you?
Go to Dreed Castle?

MsgJp:
わかった
しかし《ドリード城》への道中にある関所は
このところ厳しく通行を制限しているんだ
MsgEn:
Understood. 
However, the checkpoints along the way to 
Dreed Castle have recently been 
enforcing strict travel restrictions.

MsgJp:
よし、いいだろう――
おれが通達を出しておく
しかし、手助けはそこまでだ
あとは自分の才覚で切り抜けてくれ
MsgEn:
Alright, fine――
I will issue the order.
However, I can only assist you up to that point.
The rest is up to your own talent to overcome.

MsgJp:
クラウスが何を考えているか知らないが――
期待して待たせてもらうよ
MsgEn:
I don't know what Klaus is thinking, 
but I'll wait with anticipation.

MsgJp: ――あんたが通達に名前のあった覚者か
MsgEn:
Are you the Arisen whose name 
was mentioned in the order?

MsgJp:
もちろん通行は許可するが、ここから先は
魔物の数、そして強さが段違いだ
心して進んでくれよ
MsgEn:
Of course, we will allow your passage.
But beyond this point, the number and strength of 
the enemies are on a completely different level. 
Proceed with caution.

MsgJp:
ドリードはかつて騎士団の本拠地だった城だ
その頃の、古い見取り図を頼りに
先行隊が奥へ向かっている
MsgEn:
Dreed was once the castle that served as the 
headquarters of the Knights' Order. 
The advance party is now heading deeper into the 
castle, relying on an old blueprint from that time.

MsgJp: 彼らの居場所を目印に追うといいだろう
MsgEn:
You might want to follow their 
whereabouts as a landmark.

MsgJp:
覚者よ、注意しろ
内部は魔物だらけの上に――
MsgEn:
Arisen, be cautious.
For the depths are filled with nothing but enemies -

MsgJp:
地下牢や水路で相当複雑だ
道を間違えると、どこに出るかわからんぞ
MsgEn:
The underground dungeons and waterways 
are quite complex. 
If you take the wrong path, 
you won't know where you'll end up.

MsgJp:
覚者よ、この螺旋階段を下るんだ
２階層下に礼拝堂に続く通路がある
MsgEn:
Arisen, descend this spiral staircase.
There is a passage leading to the chapel 
two floors below.

MsgJp:
目的のモノがあるとしたら、最深部の
旧礼拝堂――団長がそう言っていた
MsgEn:
If there's something you're looking for, 
it's in the deepest part of the old chapel - 
that's what the Commander said.

MsgJp:
何があるのかまでは
俺は聞かされてないけどな
MsgEn: I haven't been told what exactly is there.

MsgJp:
ああ覚者さん！　やっときてくれたか
どうやらその扉の先が礼拝堂らしい
MsgEn:
Ah, Ser Arisen! You've finally arrived I see. 
It seems that beyond that door is the chapel.

MsgJp:
鍵はないし、魔物は多いし
まったくどうしようかと思ったよ
MsgEn:
There are no keys, and there are many enemies.
I really didn't know what to do.

MsgJp: さぁ、今度はあんたが先導してくれ
MsgEn: Now, it's your turn to lead the way.

MsgJp: 押せ押せ！　斬り込め！
MsgEn: Push, push!　Cut it down!

MsgJp: 退くな！　ひるむな！
MsgEn: Do not retreat!　Don't flinch!

MsgJp: 白騎団！　覚者に負けるな！
MsgEn:
White Knights! 
Don't lose to the Arisen!

MsgJp: 弱点を見極めろ！
MsgEn: Find the weakness!

MsgJp: 見ろ、虫の息だ！
MsgEn: Look, it's on its last legs!

MsgJp: あとひと押し！
MsgEn: One more push!

MsgJp: こ、こんな怪物ははじめてだ！
MsgEn:
This is the first time
I've beheld such a monster!

MsgJp: 無茶だよ、こんなの！
MsgEn:
This is absurd, 
I can't believe this!

MsgJp: くっ――手強い！
MsgEn: Hngh... This is tough!

MsgJp: くそ――負けるか――
MsgEn: Damn... I won't lose...

MsgJp:
ドリード城から命の器を持ち帰って――
その中には魔物の命を詰め込んで
竜に捧げればいいんじゃないか
MsgEn:
Bring back the Vessel of Life from Dreed Castle...
Fill it with the life force of slain monsters and 
offer it to the Dragon.

MsgJp: 僕が考えていたのはそういうことで――
MsgEn: That's what I was thinking--

MsgJp:
器が仲間たちの命でいっぱいになるなんて
思ってもいなかったんだ
やりきれないよ――
MsgEn:
I never imagined the vessel would be filled 
with the lives of my comrades.
It's unbearable—

MsgJp: ドリード城での出来事は聞いた
MsgEn: I heard about the events at Dreed Castle.

MsgJp:
その器に詰まっているのは
敵、味方の命――失われた命であることもな
MsgEn:
The vessel is filled with lives,
both enemy and ally—lives that were lost.

MsgJp:
